title: Bitcoin’s Market Cap Could Triple to $1.5 Trillion, Says Hedge Fund Manager Hugh Hendry
description: Popular hedger fund manager and macro investment strategist Hugh Hendry has recently revealed a bullish outlook for the flagship cryptocurrency Bitcoin ($BTC), saying its market capitalization could almost triple to $1.5 trillion as macroeconomic conditions worsen.
